title: Onwu egbuola Hugo Chavez
sentences: Onye isi ala mba Venezuela, Hugo Chavez, anwụọla
Ọ gbara nanị afọ 58 tupu ọnwụ egbuo ya
Onye osote onye isi ala mba ahụ, Nicholas Maduro, kwuputere taa na Chavez nwụrụ n’ịhe dịka elekere anọ n’ọkara, nke mgbede na mba ahụ
A mụrụ Hugo Chavez n’abalị 8 nke ọnwa Julayị afọ 1954
Nna ya bụ onye nkuzi n’otu obere obodo e nwere na Venezuela
Mama nke ukwu Chavez zụrụ ya, tupu ọ baa amị mgbe ọ dị afọ 17
N’afọ 1992, ya na ndị otu ya nwara ike ha iwere ọchịchị n’ike
Ka afọ abụọ gafere, ọ pụtara na mkpọrọ were malite ịso azọ ọkwa onye isi ala na 1998
Kemgbe ọnwa ole n’ole ka Chavez nọ n’akwa ọrịa kansa
E nwere mgbe anyị nụburu na ọ malitego ịgbake n’ọrịa
Taa, ndị Venezuela na-eru uju maka onye isi ala ha nwụrụ anwụ
